author: cms-sw
body:
SCRAM V3 complains about these flags
```
Invalid tag 'Flags' found in src/GeneratorInterface/ReggeGribovPartonMCInterface/BuildFile.xml.
Invalid tag 'Flags' found in src/GeneratorInterface/ReggeGribovPartonMCInterface/BuildFile.xml.
```

title: Fix BuildFile, use lower case flags tag
